prices.desc_1: Applies to students for which the studierendenWERK BERLIN is responsible
prices.desc_2: Applies to members of the public universities in Berlin as well as to the private universities cooperating with the studierendenWERK BERLIN.
prices.desc_3: Applies to guests of Berlin universities and universities of applied sciences.
prices.more: More details are available at stw.berlin
